name: Carry On
description:
Carry On: A game about lending a hand, or a hundred

sometimes we are broken. and that's okay.

This is a game about people helping you, and you helping them to help you. It's a game that we hope you will like.

Click on bandages to pick them up. Place them to make yourself feel better. Pick up the red things. Feel better.  Scales require lots of red things. 

Get all the red things, feel better.  Get all the friends you can.

Hugs.

If you can't pick up something by clicking on it, look around for more friends. You need enough friends to lift things. Also, there may or may not be a game-breaking bug in the form of a missing sprite on the third island.

  • Andres Chamat: Music & SFX
  • Asobu: Programming Lead & Design
  • Karen Morrison: Art & Design
  • Stevenson Streeper: Design Lead & Programming
